LanguageData.AEXP_RedPanda.label: red panda
LanguageData.AEXP_RedPanda.description: The red panda is a small mammal, slightly larger than a domestic cat, with a bear-like body and thick russet fur. The belly and limbs are black, and there are white markings on the side of the head and above its small eyes. Red pandas are very skillful and acrobatic animals that predominantly stay in trees. It is a solitary animal, mainly active from dusk to dawn, though they can be quite affectionate if properly tamed.

LanguageData.AEXP_Badger.label: badger
LanguageData.AEXP_Badger.description: Badgers are small nocturnal mammals with flat, wedge-shaped bodies, broad feet with long claws and coarse hair. Badgers have strong limbs and sharp claws that help them dig burrows and find food underground. They are omnivorous, with a diet consisting largely of earthworms, insects, grubs and small animals such as hedgehogs and rabbits.

LanguageData.AEXP_WildGoose.label: wild goose
LanguageData.AEXP_WildGoose.description: A non-domesticated grey goose. Compared to their domesticated brethren, which have been selected over thousands of years for larger size, wild geese don't lay as many eggs, and they are renowned for their aggressive temperament. Peace was never an option.

LanguageData.AEXP_Beaver.label: beaver
LanguageData.AEXP_Beaver.description: A large semiaquatic rodent with a flat, paddle-shaped tail and webbed hind feet. Beavers are renowned for their innate construction skills, building their homes, or "lodges", out of sticks, twigs, rocks, and mud in lakes, streams, and tidal river deltas. Beavers are well known for building dams across streams and constructing their lodges in the artificial ponds which form.

LanguageData.AEXP_Hedgehog.label: hedgehog
LanguageData.AEXP_Hedgehog.description: Hedgehogs are diminutive mammals with cone-shaped faces, short legs and bodies that are covered with porcupine-like quills. When in danger, the hedgehog rolls into a ball so that the quills cover the entire area of their exposed body and protects the animal from predators.
